author: Ronald Barusch
title: Dealpolitik: Governance Headache for Viacom and CBS - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: The more the Redstone family’s National Amusements Inc. holding company pushes for a merger of and , the harder it will be to survive a court challenge. And because of those two companies’ governance structures, the legal hurdles are already unusually high.
